dict.acceptation: 饥饿的；渴望的，渴望得到；（统称）饥民；荒年的，不毛的；

sent.orig: Hungry, hungry, hungry. Song like sky sing. White hair minus green water green fight.
sent.trans: 鹅，鹅，鹅。曲向象天歌，白毛浮绿水，红掌波清波。

sent.orig: I am hungry but I have been hungry for loner than I want to remember.
sent.trans: 我很饿，饿得太久了，我都不想去记有多长时间了。

sent.orig: You seemed very hungry because you will show your little red tongue when hungry.
sent.trans: 你看上去又饿了，因为你饿的时候经常吐出红红的小舌头。

sent.orig: If my two little ones were hungry, then all these panhandlers must be hungry, too.
sent.trans: 如果我的两小的饥饿，那么所有这些乞丐也一定饥饿。

sent.orig: I am hungry, but I have been hungry for longer than I want to remember.
sent.trans: 我饿了，但我已经饿了太久太久，都记不清楚是从什么时候开始的。
